DOC.brief_summary: Study aim pilot family-centred tailored nutrition intervention child welfare clinic , target previously observe dietary default Finnish child .
DOC.detailed_description: Eating habit predict diet-related health problem obesity . The default observe previously diet Finnish child include low consumption vegetable , fruit vegetable oil-based fat , high consumption sucrose , poor quality drink low frequency family meal . Child welfare clinic place promote healthy lifestyle Finnish family visit regular interval .
